articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: Ads might be coming to Apple Maps next year - TechCrunch
articles.description: This could be part of a larger strategy to introduce more advertising in iOS.
articles.content:
Apple Maps users could start seeing ads in the app as soon as next year, according to a new report from Bloombergs Mark Gurman.
Similar to Google Maps and other mapping apps, Apples plan is to allow… [+579 chars]

articles.title: What Broke for You When AWS Went Down? - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Plus, trying an AI browser, Sam Altman’s ’too big to fail’ year and the tech CEOs who talked Trump out of a San Francisco ’surge,’ in this edition of the Technology newsletter
